workflow.name: Telegram bot starter template setup & AI Agent Chatbot
workflow.description:
## Telegram Bot Starter template workflow + n8n AI Agent Chatbot 
provides a foundational setup for creating powerful Telegram bots with n8n. It handles incoming messages, photos, files, and voice notes, making it an excellent starting point for developers looking to create bots for customer engagement, support, or interactive services.

[Sign up to n8n now ‚Üí](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/u4hgi2j8tqnr) and try it!

## Key Features:
- Dynamic Message Handling: Respond to text messages, photos, files, and more.
- Modular Design: Easily integrate additional workflows such as user registration, payment modules, or custom commands.
- Error Handling: Ensure the bot gracefully manages errors and user inputs.


## Extensibility:
This workflow is the base for building any Telegram bot. Additional modules, such as a user registration module, payment integration, and user profile management, are available for easy connection to expand the bot‚Äôs functionality.
- ‚úçüèª[Use the Telegram user registration workflow ‚Üí](https://viktorgubanov.gumroad.com/l/n8n-telegram-payment-workflow-stars) 
- üíµ[Use the Telegram Payment, Invoicing and Refund Workflow for Stars ‚Üí](https://viktorgubanov.gumroad.com/l/n8n-telegram-payment-workflow-stars)

## Who Can Use This Workflow?
- Developers looking for a quick way to build and customize Telegram bots.
- Businesses and service providers who need customer interaction automation.

## Setup Instructions:
1. Replace Telegram credentials with your own API credentials.
2. Customize responses for different message types (text, photo, file).
3. If integrating with external services (like Google Sheets), update the necessary credentials and links.

 
## UPDATES:
[üî• Get the most up-to-date and expanded version ‚Üí](https://viktorgubanov.gumroad.com/l/telegram-bot-starter-template) 



**June 25**:
- New! AI Agent + Setup Instructions
- Simple setup instructions and examples are included inside the workflow as sticky notes.
 
**Sep 24**:
- Improved message handler: Updated logic to handle various types of messages using Switch (text, photo, file, voice, and callback).
- Payment processing: Added new nodes for sending invoices and handling payments via Telegram

**Aug 24**:
- Changed processing of system events: ‚Äúnew user‚Äù and ‚Äòuser who blocked bot‚Äô events




Please reach out to [Victor](https://www.linkedin.com/in/gubanovvictor/) if you need further assistance with your n8n workflows and automations! [Sign up to n8n ‚Üí](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/u4hgi2j8tqnr), you have to try it!

parameters.content:
### üöÄ Set up Telegram Trigger

1. Create a bot via [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather) and copy the **Bot Token**.
2. Connect it to this node

üìù Tip: Send `/start` to your bot in Telegram to trigger the flow.

[üîó Full guide](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/telegram/?utm_source=n8n_app&utm_medium=credential_settings&utm_campaign=create_new_credentials_modal)

### üëã New member joined? Register them automatically!

Use this node when someone joins or leaves your Telegram group.

Pair it with the [n8n Telegram Payment & Registration Workflow ‚≠êÔ∏è](https://viktorgubanov.gumroad.com/l/n8n-telegram-payment-workflow-stars) to:

- ‚úÖ Automatically **register new users** in your database
- üí¨ Send a **welcome message** or onboarding flow
- üíæ Keep track of active members for payments, access control, or CRM
- üîÅ Remove access or mark users as inactive when they leave

‚ö°Ô∏è Automate your group membership like a pro ‚Äî start now with this ready-to-use workflow!

### üí∏ Telegram Payments Made Easy with n8n

This ready-to-use workflow helps you:

- ‚úÖ Accept payments **directly in Telegram**
- üë§ Automatically **register paying users**
- ‚è≥ Control access based on subscription status or payment
- üìä Save user data for analytics, CRM, or follow-up

Perfect for:
- Online schools  
- Closed communities  
- Paid bots or premium content  

üëâ [Download the full template on Gumroad](https://viktorgubanov.gumroad.com/l/n8n-telegram-payment-workflow-stars) and start accepting payments today ‚Äî no coding required.

### üí∏ Telegram Payments Made Easy with n8n

This ready-to-use workflow helps you:

- ‚úÖ Accept payments **directly in Telegram**
- üë§ Automatically **register paying users**
- ‚è≥ Control access based on subscription status or payment
- üìä Save user data for analytics, CRM, or follow-up

Perfect for:
- Online schools  
- Closed communities  
- Paid bots or premium content  

üëâ [Download the full template on Gumroad](https://viktorgubanov.gumroad.com/l/n8n-telegram-payment-workflow-stars) and start accepting payments today ‚Äî no coding required.

### üß™ Basic AI agent for testing and play

This setup is a **lightweight prototype** that lets you:

- üí¨ Chat with an AI via Telegram  
- üß† Retain short context (3 messages) per user  
- üîÅ Explore how memory + Langchain + OpenAI work in n8n  
---

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Limitations for production use

Not suitable for serious bots without upgrades:

- üîÑ **Memory resets** on restart ‚Äî no long-term context  
- üß† **Shallow context** ‚Äî only 3 messages, no thread awareness  
- üë§ **No user profiles** ‚Äî no saved data or personalization  
- üß© **No workflow actions** ‚Äî can't trigger external APIs or steps  
- üìà **Not scalable** ‚Äî lacks logging, fallback logic, and analytics

## ü§ñ Supercharge Your Bot with Task-Specific AI Agents

### Transform your Telegram bot from a simple responder into a **versatile business assistant** powered by modular AI agents. Each agent is designed to handle a focused task ‚Äî acting like a smart, specialized teammate inside your workflow.

Seamlessly integrated with the `Langchain Agent`, these tools let your bot **search, calculate, retrieve, and automate actions**, not just respond.

‚ö°Ô∏è Want more than small talk?
Enable these agents and let your bot work like part of your operations team.

### You can find some of them in my [Gumroad page ‚Üí](https://viktorgubanov.gumroad.com/)

### üåê **Agent: Find in the Internet**  
  ‚Üí Searches live data online to answer fresh, time-sensitive queries.

### üìÅ **Agent: Search Internal Docs**  
  ‚Üí Fetches relevant answers from your internal knowledge base (Notion, Google Drive, etc.).

### üì¶ **Agent: Check Order Status** 
  ‚Üí Instantly checks order progress from Google Sheets, Airtable, or CRM.

### üí∞ **Agent: Calculate Cost or Quote**  
  ‚Üí Generates quotes using predefined pricing logic based on user input.

##### ‚ùì Need help with your own?



## Share your idea and get the estimation for your agent. 

### [Fill the form ‚Üí](https://tally.so/r/wQaeJA)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Execute Workflow node can be used when you want your workflow to treat another workflow as a step in your flow. It allows you to modularize your workflows and have a single source of truth for series of actions you perform often.
